channel.title: Need a compiler
channel.description: Can anyone give me a simple compiler? I have jdk 6 update 21. 64 Bit operating system(idk if this affects anything)

item.title: Need a compiler
item.dc:creator: @bhill bhill
item.description:
@bhill wrote:

Try this @echo off @TITLE Reality's Compiler if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. :end echo Finished! pause exit

Read full topic
